credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: A family eating melons
provenance: Ex collection: Giovanni Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, graphite, on paper
description: In a room with the window opened into a landscape, gathered around a dining table, are two seated women, a grown-up girl, and eight children eating melons.
name: Drawing
